articles.title: ‘Free and open’: Quad leaders call for ‘stable’ Indo-Pacific in veiled China dig - The Guardian
articles.description: Joe Biden meets leaders of Australia, India and Japan in latest effort to cement US leadership in Asia
articles.content:
US president Joe Biden and the leaders of Australia, India and Japan highlighted their Quad groups role in safeguarding a stable, democratic Indo-Pacific in a veiled dig at rival China.

articles.description: Major media company WarnerMedia has opened a regional hub in Singapore and will be launching its premium HBO Max platform in Asia.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
